We are soon launching a devrel incubator. krinza.eth (🧱, 🚀): this week was crazy. we onboarded a lot of people in the @developer_dao and while y'all find your home in diff guilds, teams and initiatives, if: → content → education → and seeking partnerships is smth you'd like to explore, drop a "👋". https://www.notion.so/developerdao/DevRel-ea108a8ec2a84d4e961cd72b7ba4c226
